code: export var getColor=function getColor(number){var colors={2:"#4A6075",4:"#6C78EF",8:"#20347D",16:"#79779A",32:"#55537E",64:"#9370DB",128:"#BFA36D",256:"#7665C2",512:"#B4976D",1024:"#91744B",2048:"#DDC5A2"};return colors[number];};export var getFontSize=function getFontSize(number){if(number<100)return"auto";if(number<1000)return"3rem";return"2.7rem";};
